title: LOSS PREVENTION when thers a 4v5 game in rank?
body:
just played a game 4v5 we would of still win if they didnt backdoor cause of the 5 man.

i believe there needs some shit done to this since losing a rank cause of fucktards or trolls makes ranking much more boring as an overall experience.

replies.body:
Im bringing this back

***versace versace, eshays lad head on me like im luminarty***

Haha this^^

I have another thread going about intentional feeders; I feel your pain. 

The issue with DC's is that people would just DC all the time if they were gonna lose if they just got loss prevented.
If you still gave the loss to the person who DC'd, what about their duo partner? Do you do the same to them?

I think there would defo be a way to do something about this if some thought went into it, and I defo agree with you, but it seems that this is not a high priority at the moment, sadly...

people have been trying  to think of  way to do this kind of thing for ages. The problem is (and always will be) with any kind of loss prevented/ minimised LP loss is that it is way too easy to abuse. If you are losing game really hard, why not just flame and get a member of your team to quit? why not duo and take turns waiting out penalties? It also prevents the winning team from gaining full LP or recognition for the game that they played. 

Riot is working on this, as can clearly be seen by the amount of qq threads regarding the new leaver buster penalties.
afking a game has no penalties to wait out. unless you mean the inevitable leaverbuster low priority queue and/or ban.

"oi anyone on 0 points go afk so we dont all lose points"

i expect that to happen every bad game....plz no.
